data.comment: Today's referee, Paolo Valeri, has blown to start the match.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 2, Paolo Valeri signals a throw-in for Sassuolo, close to Fiorentina's area.
Sassuolo drive upfield and Giacomo Raspadori gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
Sassuolo's Domenico Berardi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sassuolo push upfield but Paolo Valeri quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 6, Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Cristiano Biraghi for Fiorentina gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Florence.
In the minute 7, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Sofyan Amrabat (Fiorentina) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Fiorentina drives forward and Dusan Vlahovic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fiorentina push forward at Stadio Artemio Franchi and Franck Ribery gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sassuolo defence.
Hamed Junior Traore scores to make it 0-1 at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 13, Great play from Domenico Berardi to set up the goal.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
Paolo Valeri signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
In the minute 15, Sassuolo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Fiorentina.
Fiorentina's Cristiano Biraghi misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
In the minute 17, Paolo Valeri awards the home team a throw-in.
Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Sassuolo.
Free kick Fiorentina.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) has received a first yellow card.
At Stadio Artemio Franchi, Manuel Locatelli has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 20, In Florence a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Fiorentina.
In the minute 23, Sassuolo's Rogerio gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Florence Sassuolo attack through Domenico Berardi. The finish is off target, however.
Fiorentina have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Giacomo Bonaventura gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fiorentina.
Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
In the minute 27, Sassuolo's Hamed Junior Traore breaks free at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Paolo Valeri awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
In the minute 27, In Florence a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for Fiorentina in Florence.
In Florence, Fiorentina push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 29, Fiorentina pushes forward through Franck Ribery, whose finish on goal is saved.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Sassuolo's Hamed Junior Traore has been booked in Florence.
In the minute 30, Paolo Valeri awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Jeremie Boga (Sassuolo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 31, Paolo Valeri signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
Fiorentina have been given a penalty at Stadio Artemio Franchi...
Play has been interrupted briefly in Florence to check on Franck Ribery, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 35, Goal! Dusan Vlahovic makes it 1-1. The equalizer came in the form of a penalty.
Franck Ribery is back on his feet again.
Domenico Berardi for Sassuolo drives towards goal at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, In Florence, Lorenzo Venuti of Fiorentina is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Fiorentina.
Sassuolo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 42, Gaetano Castrovilli for Fiorentina gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Gaetano Castrovilli (Fiorentina) gets a yellow card.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
In Florence Sassuolo drive forward through Domenico Berardi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Fiorentina needs to be cautious. Sassuolo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Cristiano Biraghi is booked for the home team.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Fiorentina.
In Florence Fiorentina attack through Lorenzo Venuti. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Florence.
Free kick Fiorentina.
Fiorentina's German Pezzella gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
Can Fiorentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sassuolo's half?
Sassuolo needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Pedro Obiang hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Sassuolo.
Fiorentina have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 56, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
German Pezzella (Fiorentina) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 58, Nikola Milenkovic (Fiorentina) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
In the minute 60, Gaetano Castrovilli for Fiorentina drives towards goal at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Sassuolo make their first substitution with Francesco Caputo replacing Giacomo Raspadori.
In the minute 61, Gregoire Defrel is replacing Hamed Junior Traore for the away team.
Jeremy Toljan for Sassuolo has been booked by Paolo Valeri and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 63, Can Fiorentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sassuolo's half?
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 64, Fiorentina have a goal kick.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Sassuolo at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Paolo Valeri signals a throw-in for Fiorentina, close to Sassuolo's area.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Fiorentina advance rapidly upfield but Paolo Valeri blows for offside.
Sassuolo's Jeremie Boga gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 70, Paolo Valeri awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Fiorentina drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Sassuolo in Florence.
In the minute 73, Igor is on a sub for Martin Caceres for Fiorentina.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Sassuolo close to the penalty box.
The home team replace Gaetano Castrovilli with Erick Pulgar.
Christian Kouame is replacing Dusan Vlahovic for the home team.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Sassuolo are coming forward and Domenico Berardi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Paolo Valeri signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
At Stadio Artemio Franchi, Fiorentina are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 79, Filip Djuricic is on a sub for Jeremie Boga for Sassuolo.
The away team replace Pedro Obiang with Mehdi Bourabia.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Fiorentina.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
Franck Ribery hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Fiorentina in Florence.
In the minute 83, Fiorentina's Erick Pulgar breaks free at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Florence.
In the minute 83, Sassuolo make their fifth substitution with Francesco Magnanelli replacing Manuel Locatelli.
Paolo Valeri awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Borja Valero is on a sub for Giacomo Bonaventura for Fiorentina.
Sassuolo drive forward but Jeremy Toljan is judged offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, Fiorentina advance rapidly upfield but Paolo Valeri blows for offside.
Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Fiorentina.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Florence.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Florence.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gregoire Defrel (Sassuolo) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Fiorentina defenders.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The match has come to a close in Florence. The final score is 1-1.
Nikola Milenkovic (Fiorentina) has received a yellow card from Paolo Valeri.
